title: KINEEMA / STATION CALL
description:
Your first contact with the colleagues back in station 41.

* Report your badge missing
* Report your gun missing
* Get laughed at
* Beg your station for additional funds
* Get a panic attack
* Get an aweseome Firewalker persona
* Get the "Find your badge" quest
* Get the "Find your gun" quest.
* Get the "Check the local pawnshops" quest.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, come in..." He hesitates. "...."
links.text: "10-4, come in..." He hesitates. "...*Fire walker*. Over."

links.title: You: ""I need to report my badge missing.""
links.text: "I need to report my badge missing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's eyes go wide. "But..."
links.text: The lieutenant's eyes go wide. "But you said..." He shakes his head. "Never mind."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-9, repeat message. Over.""
links.text: "10-9, repeat message. Over."

links.title: You: ""My badge, I can't find it anywhere..."
links.text: "My badge, I can't find it anywhere. Basically -- it's gone."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, message received. This is a..."
links.text: "10-4, message received. This is a *very* serious situation. I need to 10-22 the captain. Over."

links.title: Half Light: "10-22 the captain?! This sounds bad..."
links.text: 10-22 the captain?! This sounds bad -- bad *and* scary, like being called to the headmaster's office in school.

links.title: You: ""10-22 the captain?! This sounds ba..."
links.text: "10-22 the captain?! This sounds bad."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, I hear you, officer. I'm jus..."
links.text: "10-4, I hear you, officer. I'm just going to make a note here that you are in pursuit of your *misplaced* badge."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""What about..." He seems to be hesi..."
links.text: "What about..." He seems to be hesitating. "What about your gun, officer? Do you still have your gun, sir? Over."

links.title: You: ""I'm still packing my Villiers.""
links.text: "I'm still packing my Villiers."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: "A sigh of relief crackles over the..."
links.text: A sigh of relief crackles over the radio. "10-4. Over."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-1, you're breaking up. 10-9, re..."
links.text: "10-1, you're breaking up. 10-9, repeat please. Over."

links.title: You: "Don't say anything."
links.text: Don't say anything.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-9, come in, officer! Over.""
links.text: "10-9, come in, officer! Over."

links.title: You: "Remain silent."
links.text: Remain silent.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Come in, officer! 10-9, repeat mes..."
links.text: "Come in, officer! 10-9, repeat message please. Did you misplace your firearm? Over."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Just say you lost your gun. Anythin..."
links.text: Just say you lost your gun. Anything else would only make the situation worse here.

links.title: You: ""That's affirmative. Over.""
links.text: "That's affirmative. Over."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Affirmative?" There's a pause."
links.text: "Affirmative?" There's a pause.

links.title: Empathy: "He didn't actually expect that answ..."
links.text: He didn't actually expect that answer.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""I'm going to report that you are i..."
links.text: "I'm going to report that you are in the process of recovering your service weapon. Over."

links.title: You: "Quietly turn the radio off and put..."
links.text: Quietly turn the radio off and put the microphone back to its holder.

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "The silence is almost deafening aft..."
links.text: The silence is almost deafening after you flick off the switch, severing the connection.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That did not go well. I guess the..."
links.text: "That did not go well. I guess the important thing is that you followed protocol and reported your lost items."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did we need anything else here?" H..."
links.text: "Did we need anything else here?" He looks around in the cabin.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Check your pockets! Check your... h..."
links.text: Check your pockets! Check your... holy fuck, you really don't know where it is, do you?!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Okay, it's gone. Your gun is most d..."
links.text: Okay, it's gone. Your gun is most definitely gone.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Chillax, partner. You don't need a..."
links.text: Chillax, partner. You don't need a gun to have fun... although it helps.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-9, come in, officer! Did you ge..."
links.text: "10-9, come in, officer! Did you get my question? I was wondering about your gun. Over."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Any other good news?""
links.text: "Any other good news?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He's saying he lost his badge.""
links.text: "He's saying he lost his badge."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Is it *him*?!" a dry voice asks in..."
links.text: "Is it *him*?!" a dry voice asks in the background. "What does he want?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-9. Over.""
You: ""I'm happy to report that I have fo..."
links.text: "I'm happy to report that I have found my badge, Jules."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, sir, glad to hear that! I'll..."
links.text: "10-4, sir, glad to hear that! I'll write down that there's no need to issue a new one to you then. Over."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Feels good to get that off your che..."
links.text: Feels good to get that off your chest, right? Celebration with beer?

links.title: You: ""Listen, I've actually lost my gun,..."
links.text: "Listen, I've actually lost my gun, too."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, I know, I already wrote it i..."
links.text: "10-4, I know, I already wrote it in a report, but..." He hesitates. "It will stay on my desk for a few days. Over."

links.title: You: ""I have successfully located my 9mm..."
links.text: "I have successfully located my 9mm Villiers pistol. It's on me now and I won't lose it again."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, sir. Roger that. And very gl..."
links.text: "10-4, sir. Roger that. And very glad to hear it. I will make relevant changes to the report."

links.title: You: ""I am in dire need of financial ass..."
links.text: "I am in dire need of financial assistance."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, I hear you. I don't have the..."
links.text: "10-4, I hear you. I don't have the authority to grant your request, but...."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Do you need anything else? Over.""
links.text: "Do you need anything else? Over."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What does he want now?""
links.text: "What does he want now?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He is asking for money.""
links.text: "He is asking for money."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Is he fucking kidding?!""
links.text: "Is he fucking kidding?!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""I don't think he is.""
links.text: "I don't think he is."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, I hear you. I don't have the..."
links.text: "10-4, I hear you. I don't have the authority to grant your request, but...."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Do you need anything else? Over.""
links.text: "Do you need anything else? Over."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Is it *him*?!" a dry voice asks in..."
links.text: "Is it *him*?!" a dry voice asks in the background. "What does he want?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He says he needs money.""
links.text: "He says he needs money."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Don't give that asshole anything,..."
links.text: "Don't give that asshole anything, he's just gonna drink it all!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Alright." The operator turns back..."
links.text: "Alright." The operator turns back to you. "That's a negative on the additional funds, sir. Over."

links.title: You: ""It is paramount to the investigati..."
links.text: "It is paramount to the investigation that you grant me more money."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He says it's important to the case.""
links.text: "He says it's important to the case."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""He isn't getting a red cent, you c..."
links.text: "He isn't getting a red cent, you can tell him that!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Request denied, sir. Over.""
links.text: "Request denied, sir. Over."

links.title: Half Light: "Nothing is working!"
links.text: Nothing is working!

links.title: You: ""Please, I'm begging you here! I do..."
links.text: "Please, I'm begging you here! I don't even have a place to sleep tonight."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He says he's in trouble, doesn't h..."
links.text: "He says he's in trouble, doesn't have a place to sleep."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Well, I guess he'd better crack th..."
links.text: "Well, I guess he'd better crack the case before sundown then!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Vicquemare said...""
links.text: "Vicquemare said..."

links.title: Suggestion: "Who cares what this Vicquemare said..."
links.text: Who cares what this Vicquemare said -- pull on their heart strings!

links.title: Authority: "Enough, officer. This begging is be..."
links.text: Enough, officer. This begging is below your dignity.

links.title: You: ""I don't want to be here anymore, I..."
links.text: "I don't want to be here anymore, I want to go home! Please come and get me..."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Uh, listen..." He seems to lower h..."
links.text: "Uh, listen..." He seems to lower his voice a bit, carefully choosing his words. "It's okay... you can do it, sir. Over."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What is he saying?""
links.text: "What is he saying?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Did you want anything else, sir?"..."
links.text: "Did you want anything else, sir?" He chooses to ignore the voice in the background. "*Many* of your colleagues are also here. Over."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's trying to keep you from furthe..."
links.text: He's trying to keep you from further embarrassing yourself in front of your colleagues.

links.title: Volition: "What? I thought you had your shit t..."
links.text: What? I thought you had your shit together! This is nearing a complete meltdown! Stop it!

links.title: You: ""Please, I don't wanna be here... I..."
links.text: "Please, I don't wanna be here... I have to..."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Suddenly the necktie feels like a b..."
links.text: Suddenly the necktie feels like a boa constrictor around your neck, squeezing the dear life out of you.

links.title: You: "Try to loosen its death-grip and br..."
links.text: Try to loosen its death-grip and breathe.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Hey, if you don't want to have the..."
links.text: Hey, if you don't want to have the most *intense orgasm* of your life, fine -- don't! The grip eases a little.

links.title: You: ""What the hell is happening to me?!""
links.text: "What the hell is happening to me?!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He... he terminated the connection..."
links.text: "He... he terminated the connection." The radio operator is no longer speaking to the microphone and is addressing someone in the background. "I guess he was in a hurry..."

links.title: You: ""Please, I'm scared! I can't... fuc..."
links.text: "Please, I'm scared! I can't... fuck, I can't breathe... Help me, please!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: "The radio falls silent and lifeless..."
links.text: The radio falls silent and lifeless. The communications officer has disconnected the call.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What was that?" the lieutenant ask..."
links.text: "What was that?" the lieutenant asks in a soft voice, gently grabbing your shoulder. "It's okay, detective."

links.title: You: ""What, you've never seen a man gett..."
links.text: "What, you've never seen a man getting a panic attack before?" (Try to keep breathing.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He gives you a long concerned look,..."
links.text: He gives you a long concerned look, then nods. "We should get on with our tasks. Work always helps me centre myself. Now... anything else you need from my vehicle or...?"

links.title: You: ""We call it *subterfuge* in the for..."
links.text: "We call it *subterfuge* in the force. Ever heard of it?" (Wipe away tears.)

links.title: You: ""I don't want to talk about it. Let..."
links.text: "I don't want to talk about it. Let's just go."

links.title: Logic: "That's it. He pulled the plug."
links.text: That's it. He pulled the plug.

links.title: You: ""No, I'm alright, I'm all right. I..."
links.text: "No, I'm alright, I'm all right. I had... other things."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Let us address them now, sir. Over.""
links.text: "Let us address them now, sir. Over."

links.title: Volition: "You *really* need to get your shit..."
links.text: You *really* need to get your shit together, this is nearing a complete meltdown.

links.title: You: ""Okay, I heard you -- no funds.""
links.text: "Okay, I heard you -- no funds."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Anything else, sir? Over.""
links.text: "Anything else, sir? Over."

links.title: You: ""This might sound odd, but there's..."
links.text: "This might sound odd, but there's *personal details* I'd like to discuss."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, sir. Sorry, but I'm under or..."
links.text: "10-4, sir. Sorry, but I'm under orders to give a negative to requests for personal information. Over."

links.title: You: ""You mean you can't tell me *anythi..."
links.text: "You mean you can't tell me *anything* about me? But I'm me!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4. Orders are still orders. Any..."
links.text: "10-4. Orders are still orders. Anything else? Over."

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4. Anything else, sir? Over.""
links.text: "10-4. Anything else, sir? Over."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Uh... okay, 10-4, sir -- I hear yo..."
links.text: "Uh... okay, 10-4, sir -- I hear you, relay your question. Over."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Wait! Before you say anything stupi..."
links.text: Wait! Before you say anything stupid, think it through!

links.title: You: "What's there to think about?"
links.text: What's there to think about?

links.title: Rhetoric: "You're going to be looking at a str..."
links.text: You're going to be looking at a straight jacket if you tell everyone you lost your memory. Be smart about this! Ask if he's there alone.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, sir, I'm not hearing your qu..."
links.text: "10-4, sir, I'm not hearing your question?" the radio operator inquires again.

links.title: You: "I need *information*, not fear."
links.text: I need *information*, not fear.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Be smart about this, ask if he's th..."
links.text: Be smart about this, ask if he's there alone.

links.title: You: ""Hold on, are you alone in the room..."
links.text: "Hold on, are you alone in the room? I need some confidential information about myself."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""That's a negative, sir, I got a 10..."
links.text: "That's a negative, sir, I got a 10-12 (Visitors Present) here. Over."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""That's a negative, sir, I got a 10..."
links.text: "That's a negative, sir, I got a 10-12 here. Over."

links.title: You: ""I wanted to know if you got my bad..."
links.text: "I wanted to know if you got my badge's description right in your report. Could you read it to me -- name, rank, date of birth?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What? What is it?! He's still on t..."
links.text: "What? What is it?! He's still on the line?!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He wants to verify the information..."
links.text: "He wants to verify the information on his badge."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""But of course, it says Dick Mullen..."
links.text: "But of course, it says Dick Mullen -- High General of the Revacholian Cavalry Force."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Tell him to stop wasting time!""
links.text: "Tell him to stop wasting time!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""What do you need, sir? Over.""
links.text: "What do you need, sir? Over."

links.title: You: ""I'm looking for my address. I don'..."
links.text: "I'm looking for my address. I don't know where I live."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4. Your address---""
links.text: "10-4. Your address---"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Hold up, Jules. He doesn't fucking..."
links.text: "Hold up, Jules. He doesn't fucking know where he lives?! Did I hear that right?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Seems like it, sir.""
links.text: "Seems like it, sir."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No. Fuck him. Don't tell him anyth..."
links.text: "No. Fuck him. Don't tell him anything, you understand? He's been hellbound for the gutter, let him have it."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Sorry, sir. Anything more I can do..."
links.text: "Sorry, sir. Anything more I can do for you? Over."

links.title: You: ""Please refer to me with my full na..."
links.text: "Please refer to me with my full name in the future."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-9, repeat message! I didn't get..."
links.text: "10-9, repeat message! I didn't get that, sir. Over."

links.title: You: ""Say. My. Name.""
links.text: "Say. My. Name."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Sir, I will not have you talk to m..."
links.text: "Sir, I will not have you talk to me in this manner. Over."

links.title: You: ""Please just say my name, Jules!""
links.text: "Please just say my name, Jules!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Uh...""
Mack Torson: ""Oldboy,  is fucky *still* at it?!..."
links.text: "Oldboy,  is fucky *still* at it?! What the hell does he want now?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He seems intoxicated and keeps ask..."
links.text: "He seems intoxicated and keeps asking me to call him by his name."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Mullen's drunk and emotionally agg..."
links.text: "Mullen's drunk and emotionally aggressive. That's new."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Tell him to sober up and blow hims..."
links.text: "Tell him to sober up and blow himself."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Wrap it up, don't indulge in his d..."
links.text: "Wrap it up, don't indulge in his drunken antics!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What? What is it? What can he poss..."
links.text: "What? What is it? What can he possibly still want from us?!"

links.title: You: ""Stop calling me *sir* and just use..."
links.text: "Stop calling me *sir* and just use my real god damn name, will you?!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Sir, I will not have you talk to m..."
links.text: "Sir, I will not have you talk to me in this manner. Over."

links.title: Suggestion: "SAY MY NAME BITCH! What are you doi..."
links.text: SAY MY NAME BITCH! What are you doing, you sound way too aggressive.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You're blowing it."
links.text: You're blowing it.

links.title: You: ""Please refer to me with my last na..."
links.text: "Please refer to me with my last name in the future."

links.title: You: ""Any news about my... uhm, family?""
links.text: "Any news about my... uhm, family?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-... uh... excuse me, sir? Over.""
links.text: "10-... uh... excuse me, sir? Over."

links.title: Inland Empire: "You probably don't *want* to contin..."
links.text: You probably don't *want* to continue on this road.

links.title: You: ""I just thought you might have hear..."
links.text: "I just thought you might have heard of them, that's all."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Uh... No, sir, I haven't. You're n..."
links.text: "Uh... No, sir, I haven't. You're not really keen on mentioning your home life, so I've always assumed things weren't that good on that front. Over."

links.title: You: ""Nothing. Never mind.""
links.text: "Nothing. Never mind."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Come again, sir, I didn't get that..."
links.text: "Come again, sir, I didn't get that! 10-9. Over!"

links.title: You: ""Have I ever told you about my life..."
links.text: "Have I ever told you about my life before the RCM?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, well that's a...""
links.text: "10-4, well that's a..."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""*What* the fuck does he want now?..."
links.text: "*What* the fuck does he want now? More attention? A fiver? A parade?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""No, I think he's requesting person..."
links.text: "No, I think he's requesting personal details of his life." He returns to you. "Officer, you've never shared things of that nature with me. Over."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Does he actually want something or..."
links.text: "Does he actually want something or is he hell-bent on disrupting our work?!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He asked if he ever told me about..."
links.text: "He asked if he ever told me about his days before joining the RCM."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""For god's sake, cut this shit out!..."
links.text: "For god's sake, cut this shit out! Tell him to stop wasting time and be a goddamn policeman for a change!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Sir, Satellite-Officer Vicquemare..."
links.text: "Sir, Satellite-Officer Vicquemare says..."

links.title: You: ""I heard him.""
links.text: "I heard him."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""So, was there anything else?""
links.text: "So, was there anything else?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, let's wrap this up." (Conclu..."
links.text: "Yeah, let's wrap this up." (Conclude.)

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Understood, sir. Over.""
links.text: "Understood, sir. Over."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4. Your badge should have most..."
links.text: "10-4. Your badge should have most of your personal details? Look over that. Over."

links.title: You: ""I, uh... I don't have it. My badge.""
links.text: "I, uh... I don't have it. My badge."

links.title: You: ""Of course. My badge. I can look at..."
links.text: "Of course. My badge. I can look at my badge that I have." (Lie.)

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4. Anything else for you, sir?..."
links.text: "10-4. Anything else for you, sir? Over."

links.title: You: ""Jules, I've heard that some people..."
links.text: "Jules, I've heard that some people think of me as a La Puta Madre's peone... Do you think I'm corrupted?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, sir." There's a pause, as he..."
links.text: "10-4, sir." There's a pause, as he seems to mull it over behind his enormous radio-microphone. "Well, there's been some talk, sir," he finally says reluctantly.

links.title: You: ""Some *talk*? What does it even mea..."
links.text: "Some *talk*? What does it even mean there's been some talk? Do they think I'm corrupt or not?!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""I only meant that there's been som..."
links.text: "I only meant that there's been some talk in the station, that's all. But there's always some talk in the station. You know how officers in Jamrock are..."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""But then again, some of us truly a..."
links.text: "But then again, some of us truly are on the take. It's unfortunate. Over."

links.title: You: ""Does it mean people know that I'm..."
links.text: "Does it mean people know that I'm a dirty cop? Because I am. I'm the dirtiest, most dangerous cop in Revachol. My reputation precedes me."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""I hope you're joking, sir." His vo..."
links.text: "I hope you're joking, sir." His voice is dry and humourless. "I only meant that there's been some talk in the station, that's all. But there's always some talk in the station. You know how officers in Jamrock are..."

links.title: You: ""I want you to know that I would *n..."
links.text: "I want you to know that I would *never ever* do anything like that. I'm not taking bribes, Jules!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""I only meant that there's been som..."
links.text: "I only meant that there's been some talk in the station, that's all. But there's always some talk in the station. You know how officers in Jamrock are..."

links.title: You: ""That's all for now." (End call wit..."
links.text: "That's all for now." (End call with the 41st.)

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Roger that. 10-10. Over and out."..."
links.text: "Roger that. 10-10. Over and out." With those words the cabin becomes silent again, the radio-microphone resting on its hook.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Says he lost his badge and needs t..."
links.text: "Says he lost his badge and needs to report it."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""He what...? He lost his badge?!""
links.text: "He what...? He lost his badge?!"

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Who lost his badge?""
links.text: "Who lost his badge?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Dick fucking Mullen, who do you th..."
links.text: "Dick fucking Mullen, who do you think?"

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""It's officer Dick Mullen from the..."
links.text: "It's officer Dick Mullen from the bestseller 'Dick Mullen and the Lost Identity,'" he says fighting off laughter.

links.title: Authority: "DEFEND YOURSELF. Immediately. They'..."
links.text: DEFEND YOURSELF. Immediately. They're laughing at you.

links.title: You: ""Very funny. Who's the Mullen-joker?""
links.text: "Very funny. Who's the Mullen-joker?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He wants to know who you are.""
links.text: "He wants to know who you are."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""I'm the goddamned Hjelmdallermann!..."
links.text: "I'm the goddamned Hjelmdallermann! Yeah, tell him I hail from the north!" His laughter is high-pitched and joyous, almost childlike.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""This is Satellite-Officer McLaine,..."
links.text: "This is Satellite-Officer McLaine, sir. Over."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Ask him... Ask him to check his ha..."
links.text: "Ask him... Ask him to check his hand -- the one without a wine bottle -- I bet that's where his badge is!"

links.title: You: ""C'mon operator, tell them to stop...."
links.text: "C'mon operator, tell them to stop. This is serious!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He's asking you to stop. Says this..."
links.text: "He's asking you to stop. Says this is serious."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Of course it's serious. He lost hi..."
links.text: "Of course it's serious. He lost his fucking badge!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Satellite-Officer Vicquermare conc..."
links.text: "Satellite-Officer Vicquermare concurs, losing your badge *is* serious. Over."

links.title: You: ""Ha-ha, officer has lost his badge,..."
links.text: "Ha-ha, officer has lost his badge, ha-ha. Like I'm the first cop to ever misplace his badge."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He says this has probably happened..."
links.text: "He says this has probably happened to other policemen before him and laughs sarcastically."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Oh goddamnit, is he fucking kiddin..."
links.text: "Oh goddamnit, is he fucking kidding? The whole station's gonna be *dicked* for this."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Satellite-Officer Vicquemare is wo..."
links.text: "Satellite-Officer Vicquemare is wondering if you might be joking and adds that this tarnishes the reputation of the entire station. Over."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Mullen dicked us...""
links.text: "Mullen dicked us..."

links.title: You: ""Can't we just move on? I want to g..."
links.text: "Can't we just move on? I want to get it reported and be done with it." (Proceed.)

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, I hear you, officer. I'm jus..."
links.text: "10-4, I hear you, officer. I'm just going to make a note here that you are in pursuit of your *misplaced* badge. Over."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Fuck me! Mack, come here, you've g..."
links.text: "Fuck me! Mack, come here, you've got to hear this! Dick Mullen lost his badge!"

links.title: Mack Torson: ""What's going on?""
links.text: "What's going on?"

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Supercop here lost his badge!""
links.text: "Supercop here lost his badge!"

links.title: Mack Torson: ""He lost his *what* now?!""
links.text: "He lost his *what* now?!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""His badge. He lost his goddamned f..."
links.text: "His badge. He lost his goddamned fucking badge."

links.title: You: ""Didn't you glue your eyes shut ear..."
links.text: "Didn't you glue your eyes shut earlier? And now you're making fun of *me*?!"

links.title: Mack Torson: "The man is laughing too hard to for..."
links.text: The man is laughing too hard to form coherent sentences. The only words you can make out are 'lost' and 'badge'.

links.title: You: ""Could you all please just stop say..."
links.text: "Could you all please just stop saying 'lost his badge' for a moment?!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He asks you to please stop saying..."
links.text: "He asks you to please stop saying he lost his badge."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Why, did he find it?" The room at..."
links.text: "Why, did he find it?" The room at the other end of the line erupts in volcanic laughter.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Sergeant Torson was wondering if y..."
links.text: "Sergeant Torson was wondering if you found your badge yet? Over."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Hit them with a comeback."
links.text: Hit them with a comeback.

links.title: You: ""Yes, tell him I found it from his..."
links.text: "Yes, tell him I found it from his mother's bed."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Negative, sir. Over." You can hear..."
links.text: "Negative, sir. Over." You can hear laughter in the background.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He's not replying. Looks like he i..."
links.text: "He's not replying. Looks like he is still looking for it." You can hear laughter in the background.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Uhm... you don't have a comeback, s..."
links.text: Uhm... you don't have a comeback, sorry. It's hard to think like this.

links.title: You: ""Uhm...""
You: ""Enough with this now, I have other..."
links.text: "Enough with this now, I have other things to discuss."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-9, come again, I didn't get tha..."
links.text: "10-9, come again, I didn't get that. Over." The animated conversation in the back is making it difficult for him to hear you.

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""... new heights even for Captain S..."
links.text: "... new heights even for Captain Sober!"

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Ask him..." The speaker gasps for..."
links.text: "Ask him..." The speaker gasps for air. "Ask him if he lost his *gun* too!" The room roars with laughter.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Sergeant Torson wants to know if y..."
links.text: "Sergeant Torson wants to know if you lost your gun too. Over."

links.title: You: ""I have my Villiers right here.""
links.text: "I have my Villiers right here."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: "A sigh of relief crackles over the..."
links.text: A sigh of relief crackles over the radio. "10-4. He says he's got it."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Thank god for that! That would hav..."
links.text: "Thank god for that! That would have been a nightmare. I don't even want to imagine the poor *shit* who has to relay that kind of news to the captain.."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Losing his badge is bad enough. Te..."
links.text: "Losing his badge is bad enough. Tell him to find it and fast! We can't have some gang banger running around with it."

links.title: You: ""Don't be an asshole, I'm on the ca..."
links.text: "Don't be an asshole, I'm on the case."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: "Another crackled sigh of relief. "A..."
links.text: Another crackled sigh of relief. "Anything else we can do for you? Over."

links.title: You: ""I'm doing my best, okay?""
links.text: "I'm doing my best, okay?"

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: "(Yell.) "Right fucking here! I have..."
links.text: (Yell.) "Right fucking here! I have my Villiers right here! I found it!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: "A sigh of relief crackles over the..."
links.text: A sigh of relief crackles over the radio. "10-4. He says he's located it."

links.title: Half Light: "Oh fuck..."
links.text: Oh fuck...

links.title: You: "Convince them that you didn't lose..."
links.text: Convince them that you didn't lose your gun.

links.title: Drama: "Lying over the phone? It's easy! Ju..."
links.text: Lying over the phone? It's easy! Just say it like it's the truth -- and then it becomes it.

links.title: You: ""No, of course I didn't lose my gun.""
links.text: "No, of course I didn't lose my gun."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He says he didn't.""
links.text: "He says he didn't."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Thank god for that! That would hav..."
links.text: "Thank god for that! That would have been a nightmare. I don't even want to imagine the poor prick who has to relay that kind of news to the captain."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Losing his badge is bad enough. Te..."
links.text: "Losing his badge is bad enough. Tell him to find it and *fast*! We can't have some gangbanger running around with it."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""We're all glad to hear you've not..."
links.text: "We're all glad to hear you've not lost your gun, officer. Do you need further assistance? Over."

links.title: Drama: "Even before you can get the words o..."
links.text: Even before you can get the words out, everything gets scrambled in your brain.

links.title: You: ""No, of course I didn't lose my fun..."
links.text: "No, of course I didn't lose my fun. *Gun*. Fuck it! I didn't lose my gun!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He says he didn't lose his gun --..."
links.text: "He says he didn't lose his gun -- *or* his fun, whatever that means."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Ask him to describe it! His gun! N..."
links.text: "Ask him to describe it! His gun! Not his *fun*, just the gun will do..." He laughs.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Satellite-Officer McLaine requests..."
links.text: "Satellite-Officer McLaine requests a description of your weapon. Over."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "The fuck do you need a gun for? Loo..."
links.text: The fuck do you need a gun for? Look at the pythons on your arms. You *are* a gun. The biggest one in the world.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Oh, *requests a description*, huh?..."
links.text: Oh, *requests a description*, huh? We'll *give* him one. Describe the Blaasma Gun.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "We can do it, brother. You have it..."
links.text: We can do it, brother. You have it in the nerve endings in your hand. You just need to dig into your muscle memory.

links.title: You: "Try to imagine the weapon in your h..."
links.text: Try to imagine the weapon in your hand.

links.title: Interfacing: "Click, your index finger goes as th..."
links.text: Click, your index finger goes as the thumb cocks the hammer, click, cock, click... and then nothing. Three-shot, probably. Needs reloading. Break it open.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You are describing a Villiers three..."
links.text: You are describing a Villiers three-shot 9mm Pepperbox with a revolving barrel.

links.title: You: ""You really think I'd lose my *Vill..."
links.text: "You really think I'd lose my *Villiers 9mm*? Nine millimetres of red hot leaden pepper for you right here, boys!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He's describing his Pepperbox alri..."
links.text: "He's describing his Pepperbox alright."

links.title: You: ""Triangular barrel, three shot, ham..."
links.text: "Triangular barrel, three shot, hammer at the end -- what else do you want from me? To tell you all about my wooden handle? Lay off, boys."

links.title: You: ""For starters, it's *massive*. Got..."
links.text: "For starters, it's *massive*. Got flared cooling vents along the front and hydrogen flasks sticking out too."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-9, come again please. Over.""
links.text: "10-9, come again please. Over."

links.title: You: ""It's got a magnetic accelerator an..."
links.text: "It's got a magnetic accelerator an *arc* that accelerates the energized ball of periwinkle-blue hydrogen-based *blaasma* to near light speed..."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Uh... I'm going to need to put you..."
links.text: "Uh... I'm going to need to put you on speaker for a second. Over."

links.title: You: ""In contact it *detonates* with the..."
links.text: "In contact it *detonates* with the power of a dying star, erasing every living thing from existence. Oh, and did I mention it is dripping with sexy blue blaasma?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""The officer is describing his geni..."
links.text: "The officer is describing his genitalia in exaggerated terms. Over."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I lied. I don't have it.""
links.text: "Okay, I lied. I don't have it."

links.title: You: "(Whisper to the lieutenant.) "Kim,..."
links.text: (Whisper to the lieutenant.) "Kim, what are you packing?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a single-shot Kiejl A9. An *A..."
links.text: "It's a single-shot Kiejl A9. An *Armistice* to be precise."

links.title: You: "(Speak into the radio.) "It's a sin..."
links.text: (Speak into the radio.) "It's a single-shot Armistice Kiejl A9. Over."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Says it's a Kiejl 9mm...  Armistic..."
links.text: "Says it's a Kiejl 9mm...  Armistice."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Armistice? What, is he a fucking....."
links.text: "Armistice? What, is he a fucking...? Clearly he doesn't have his Villiers anymore."

links.title: You: ""It's a gun, what can I say? A regu..."
links.text: "It's a gun, what can I say? A regular god damn murder weapon, you know how they are -- *bang-bang*."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He says it's just a regular gun.""
links.text: "He says it's just a regular gun."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Sounds like he's being deliberatel..."
links.text: "Sounds like he's being deliberately vague."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Detective Mullen has done it again..."
links.text: "Detective Mullen has done it again! 'Uh... where's my gun?'" the speaker crudely mimics your voice.

links.title: You: ""Trick question. I'm a martial arti..."
links.text: "Trick question. I'm a martial artist. My entire body is one big gun."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Uh... He says he is a living weapo..."
links.text: "Uh... He says he is a living weapon and we are trying to trick him."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Host in heaven, did he lose his gu..."
links.text: "Host in heaven, did he lose his gun *and* his mind?"

links.title: You: ""Look, I don't have it, all right?..."
links.text: "Look, I don't have it, all right? I don't have my gun."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-1, you're breaking up. 10-9, re..."
links.text: "10-1, you're breaking up. 10-9, repeat please. Over."

links.title: You: "Don't say anything."
links.text: Don't say anything.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-9, come in, officer! Over.""
links.text: "10-9, come in, officer! Over."

links.title: You: "Remain silent with terror."
links.text: Remain silent with terror.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Come in, officer! 10-9, repeat mes..."
links.text: "Come in, officer! 10-9, repeat message please. Did you misplace your firearm? Over."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Just say you lost your gun. Anythin..."
links.text: Just say you lost your gun. Anything else would only make the situation worse here.

links.title: You: ""That's affirmative. Over.""
links.text: "That's affirmative. Over."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He says he doesn't have it.""
links.text: "He says he doesn't have it."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Dear god, he lost his gun!!! Oh my..."
links.text: "Dear god, he lost his gun!!! Oh my... I can't... He..." The man succumbs to laughter again.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""This isn't really a laughing matte..."
links.text: "This isn't really a laughing matter..."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Mack can face the Giant of Koko Nu..."
links.text: "Mack can face the Giant of Koko Nur by himself, but Disco here made him piss his pants!"

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Oh I... I can't... Fuuuuuck, he lo..."
links.text: "Oh I... I can't... Fuuuuuck, he lost his... Ask him if he still has his wiener!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""I'm not going to...""
links.text: "I'm not going to..."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Ask him!""
links.text: "Ask him!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Sergeant Torson here is wondering..."
links.text: "Sergeant Torson here is wondering if you are still in possession of your genitalia. Over."

links.title: Half Light: "Now is a good time to say "fuck" an..."
links.text: Now is a good time to say "fuck" and "ass" and so on, that'll make this all right.

links.title: You: ""Yes, I lost my wiener too, just la..."
links.text: "Yes, I lost my wiener too, just lay off, okay?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He acknowledges your joke and asks..."
links.text: "He acknowledges your joke and asks you to lay off."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Lay off? Lay off?! Tell him we'll..."
links.text: "Lay off? Lay off?! Tell him we'll lay off when he retrieves the goddamn police property that he has been entrusted with."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Satellite-Officer...""
links.text: "Satellite-Officer..."

links.title: You: ""I heard him and I'm on it. ""
links.text: "I heard him and I'm on it. "

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, affirmative. Officer is in p..."
links.text: "10-4, affirmative. Officer is in pursuit of his firearm." There's static.

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Oh god, I..." The man is fighting..."
links.text: "Oh god, I..." The man is fighting back tears.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Officer, do you need further assis..."
links.text: "Officer, do you need further assistance? Over."

links.title: You: ""No, I think I'm good. I think I'm..."
links.text: "No, I think I'm good. I think I'm good without my gun, thanks."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""I'm going to report that you are i..."
links.text: "I'm going to report that you are in pursuit of your service weapon. Over."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""In pursuit of his..." The man is f..."
links.text: "In pursuit of his..." The man is fighting back tears.

links.title: You: ""No, I think I'm good. I think I'm..."
links.text: "No, I think I'm good. I think I'm good without my badge, thanks."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""I'm going to report that you are i..."
links.text: "I'm going to report that you are in pursuit of your missing items. Over."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""In pursuit of his..." The man is f..."
links.text: "In pursuit of his..." The man is fighting back tears.

links.title: You: ""I left it at his momma's after I f..."
links.text: "I left it at his momma's after I fucked her ass all night. Tell him that."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""That's a negative. Not going to sa..."
links.text: "That's a negative. Not going to say that. Over."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""What's he saying? Share with the c..."
links.text: "What's he saying? Share with the class!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He... He said he sodomized your mo..."
links.text: "He... He said he sodomized your mother."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""The prick ate momma's vanilla waff..."
links.text: "The prick ate momma's vanilla waffles at the captain's birthday party! Some nerve he's got..."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Sure her vanilla waffles were the..."
links.text: "Sure her vanilla waffles were the only thing he ate?"

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Shut up, Chester, this isn't funny..."
links.text: "Shut up, Chester, this isn't funny. This is my mom we're talking about!"

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Tell him to apologize right now!""
links.text: "Tell him to apologize right now!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Sergeant Torson requests that you..."
links.text: "Sergeant Torson requests that you apologize for the claims you made about his mother. Over."

links.title: You: ""Okay, tell him I'm sorry -- It was..."
links.text: "Okay, tell him I'm sorry -- It was just banter, I thought that's what cops do."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He says he's sorry and he didn't m..."
links.text: "He says he's sorry and he didn't mean nothing by it."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Okay, tell him...""
links.text: "Okay, tell him..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Tell him to find his *goddamn* bad..."
links.text: "Tell him to find his *goddamn* badge and gun, that's the *only* thing that matters here!"

links.title: You: ""Hey, if you don't like the fallout..."
links.text: "Hey, if you don't like the fallout, maybe *don't* fuck with the Firewalker!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Mack, he says maybe you shouldn't..."
links.text: "Mack, he says maybe you shouldn't have antagonised the Firewalker in the first place."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Who?!" The disbelief in Vicquemare..."
links.text: "Who?!" The disbelief in Vicquemare's voice is overwhelming.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Satellite-Officer Vicque---""
links.text: "Satellite-Officer Vicque---"

links.title: You: ""Fire. Walker.""
links.text: "Fire. Walker."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""I am afraid he might be referring..."
links.text: "I am afraid he might be referring to himself as *Firewater*, sir."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fire-*water*? He's lost it... Fuck..."
links.text: "Fire-*water*? He's lost it... Fuck it, tell him to find his goddamn badge and gun, that's the only thing that matters!"

links.title: You: ""I don't need to listen to this. Fi..."
links.text: "I don't need to listen to this. Firewalker out!" (Turn off the radio.)

links.title: You: "(Put the microphone back in its hol..."
links.text: (Put the microphone back in its holder and quit the call.)

links.title: Half Light: "Check your pockets! Check your... h..."
links.text: Check your pockets! Check your... holy fuck, you don't know where it is, do you?!

links.title: You: "Oh god, it's not here..."
links.text: Oh god, it's not here...

links.title: Half Light: "Okay, it's gone. Your gun is most d..."
links.text: Okay, it's gone. Your gun is most definitely gone.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Don't sweat it, *bratan*. You don't..."
links.text: Don't sweat it, *bratan*. You don't need a gun to have fun... we can still have fun. It's not all over.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-9, come in, officer! Did you ge..."
links.text: "10-9, come in, officer! Did you get my question? We were wondering about your gun. Over."

links.title: You: "I DON'T HAVE MY GUN?!"
links.text: I DON'T HAVE MY GUN?!

links.title: Half Light: "No, it's gone. It's not fucking *on..."
links.text: No, it's gone. It's not fucking *on* you!

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Dick Mullen is *not* your name. It'..."
links.text: Dick Mullen is *not* your name. It's the name of a *fictional* detective who would *not* lose his badge.

links.title: You: ""Hey, who is this?!""
links.text: "Hey, who is this?!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""This is Communications Officer Jul..."
links.text: "This is Communications Officer Jules Pidieu, sir. Over."

links.title: You: ""No, the other one!""
links.text: "No, the other one!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""You mean your partner? Over.""
links.text: "You mean your partner? Over."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What is he saying?""
links.text: "What is he saying?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""He's asking who you are.""
links.text: "He's asking who you are."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I'm his *goddamn* partner!""
links.text: "I'm his *goddamn* partner!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""It's your partner, Satellite-Offic..."
links.text: "It's your partner, Satellite-Officer Vicquemare, sir. Over."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Did he lose his memory along with..."
links.text: "Did he lose his memory along with his fucking badge?" The man in the background sounds like he's losing his patience.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Eighteen kilometres to the south, i..."
links.text: Eighteen kilometres to the south, in the 41st Precinct's relay booth, a small crowd has gathered around communication officer Jules "Oldboy" Pidieu -- around a dozen cops.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The small room is filled with cigar..."
links.text: The small room is filled with cigarette smoke, abuzz with laughter, when Officer Judit Minot enters. Her left arm is in bandages and her hair trimmed short.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""What is going on here? Did somethi..."
links.text: "What is going on here? Did something happen?" she asks, startled. Jean Vicquemare turns to her and says...

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What happened is my partner made c..."
links.text: "What happened is my partner made contact -- it's not good. He's lost his badge *and* his sidearm. He seemed confused, delirious even..." He stops to think.

links.title: Mack Torson: "Mack 'The Torso' Torson is finger-f..."
links.text: Mack 'The Torso' Torson is finger-fucking his fist, laughing hoarsely and apparently telling some dirty story to his partner, Chester McLaine, near the entrance.

links.title: Mack Torson: ""Yeah, Mullen was fucked alright. S..."
links.text: "Yeah, Mullen was fucked alright. Sounded fucking drunk to me."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Yeah, Mack's right, this was some..."
links.text: "Yeah, Mack's right, this was some gnarly shit there. I mean, before he started begging for money -- it was..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Enough!" The commotion dies down...."
links.text: "Enough!" The commotion dies down. All eyes turn to Satellite-Officer Vicquemare. "None of this is funny! It's fucking sad, that's what it is. He's a cop. He's one of us, goddamn this..."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""We must help him." Minot looks dow..."
links.text: "We must help him." Minot looks down at her neatly polished black shoes. There is a quiet firmness to her voice when she speaks.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah? How do you fucking plan to d..."
links.text: "Yeah? How do you fucking plan to do that, huh?! Get him off the drink?! Go jogging with him in the morning and get him on carrot juice?! He's a lost man!"

links.title: Judit Minot: ""I just know we can't give up on hi..."
links.text: "I just know we can't give up on him when he's at his weakest. He wouldn't..." The crowd in the room has started fidgeting uncomfortably. Someone's trying to slip out unnoticed.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Mack, man the door," he gestures T..."
links.text: "Mack, man the door," he gestures Torson to block the doorway, then turns to Minot. "You know what he told me? 'I don't want to get better -- I want to get worse.' Those were his words." He sighs heavily and turns to address the room...

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""This shit does *not* leave this ro..."
links.text: "This shit does *not* leave this room! Not a word of this to the captain or anyone else. We'll give him a couple of days to pull his shit together!"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""I guess I can hold off the report..."
links.text: "I guess I can hold off the report for a few days." Oldboy lights another cigarette.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Good," Vicquemare turns to the oth..."
links.text: "Good," Vicquemare turns to the others, "Okay everybody, nothing but a prank call here. We all got our laughs, now get back to work!"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Far north -- on the other side of t..."
links.text: Far north -- on the other side of the motorway -- the officer quietly hunches with his hand in the motor carriage.

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Yeah, Mack's right, that was some..."
links.text: "Yeah, Mack's right, that was some gnarly shit there..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What happened is my partner made c..."
links.text: "What happened is my partner made contact. And it's not good. He's lost his badge. He seemed confused, delirious even..." He stops to reflect.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""Roger that. 10-10. Over and out."..."
links.text: "Roger that. 10-10. Over and out." The static ends with a loud click, then everything is silent in the cabin.

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, come in, officer! Over.""
links.text: "10-4, come in, officer! Over."

dialogueTree.title: Alice: ""Just a second, officer..." She put..."
dialogueTree.text: "Just a second, officer..." She puts you on hold, the static crackling softly like a bonfire. After a while you hear an old man greet you from the radio. His rattly voice is oddly familiar:

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-2 (Receiving Well), 10-5 (Relay..."
links.text: "10-2 (Receiving Well), 10-5 (Relay Message). This is 41st, come in! Over."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "A scrawny old man sits in a dusty c..."
links.text: A scrawny old man sits in a dusty cubicle, smoking, with a large white rectangle sewn on his vest. In front of him is a box-shaped apparatus with an array of wires and antennas -- the radio switchboard.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The man uses relay code. You got th..."
links.text: The man uses relay code. You got this. You're a cop and cops *know* relay code.

links.title: You: ""10-4, Station 41. I've got a urgen..."
links.text: "10-4, Station 41. I've got a urgent business. Over."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4 (Message Received), 10-5 (Rel..."
links.text: "10-4 (Message Received), 10-5 (Relay Message). What's your status? Over."

links.title: You: ""Just reporting in. Over.""
links.text: "Just reporting in. Over."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-18. State your message, sir.""
links.text: "10-18. State your message, sir."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-18, 10-20? Over.""
You: ""Uh, can you repeat that?""
links.text: "Uh, can you repeat that?"

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-18, 10-20? Over.""
You: ""Please just talk human to me. Thes..."
links.text: "Please just talk human to me. These numbers mean nothing to me."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""State your message, sir. Over.""
links.text: "State your message, sir. Over."

links.title: You: ""Hi, this is... *me* here, I work a..."
links.text: "Hi, this is... *me* here, I work at your station."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-4, what's your status? Over.""
links.text: "10-4, what's your status? Over."

links.title: You: ""My status? I, uh...""
links.text: "My status? I, uh..."

links.title: You: ""It's not good.""
links.text: "It's not good."

links.title: Jules Pidieu: ""10-2, 10-5. This is 41st, come in!..."
links.text: "10-2, 10-5. This is 41st, come in! Over."
